00036 struct SMaterialPassBlendStates
00037 {
00038         SMaterialPassBlendStates();
00039         ~SMaterialPassBlendStates();
00040 
00042         EGRBLENDMODE srcColorBlendFactor;
00043         EGRBLENDMODE srcAlphaBlendFactor;
00044         EGRBLENDMODE dstColorBlendFactor;
00045         EGRBLENDMODE dstAlphaBlendFactor;
00046 
00047         bool operator == ( const SMaterialPassBlendStates& rhs ) const
00048         {
00049                 return ( srcColorBlendFactor == rhs.srcColorBlendFactor &&
00050                                  dstColorBlendFactor == rhs.dstColorBlendFactor &&
00051                                  srcAlphaBlendFactor == rhs.srcAlphaBlendFactor &&
00052                                  dstAlphaBlendFactor == rhs.dstAlphaBlendFactor );
00053         }
00054 };
